name: Phantasy Star Generation: 2
description: Phantasy Star Generation 2 is a remake of the game Phantasy Star II, originally released for the Sega Mega Drive in 1989, for the Sony PlayStation 2. It was remade by 3D AGES, a joint venture between Sega and D3 Publisher, as the 17th title of the Sega Ages 2500 series of games.
